detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.

Wide blouse in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave with decorative gathers around the neckline and in the shoulder seams. V-neck with ties at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with pleats for added width and wide, buttoned cuffs.
Short necklace in metal with sparkly stones. Width 2.5 cm. Adjustable fastener approx. 29-39.5 cm.
Large scrunchie in an airy weave. Diameter approx. 14 cm.
Fancy dress cape in tulle with a hood and a hook and loop fastening at the neck.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringe trims along the sides. Size 90x190 cm.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with frill-trimmed hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in superstretch denim with narrow shoulder straps, a visible zip at the back, and a seam and detachable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist.
Swimsuit with crossover frills at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Lined front and gusset.
Hi-tops with a hook and loop tab at the top and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh insoles and fluted soles.
Striped 40 denier socks with elasticated tops.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose jersey with 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Pencil case in transparent plastic with a holographic shimmering finish. Zip at the top that continues a short way down the sides. Size 5x6.5x20 cm.
Leggings in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Shirt in airy cotton with a grandad collar, button placket, flap chest pocket with a button and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a button fly and raw-edge hem.
Short dress in patterned mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar that has a gathered seam at the front. Opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck.

Long dress in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Gathers at the shoulders and draping at the front with a deep V-neck. Lace lining at the front and a lace-covered back with an opening. Concealed zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Small frill with overlocked edges at the shoulders and waist. Lined skirt.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Slides with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Metal studs in various designs. Size from 0.5 to 1.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, short raw-edge sleeves layered over long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a kangaroo pocket and raw-edge hem.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Swimsuit with a drawstring and gathers at the sides. Straight-cut at the top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Lined.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Knee-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and a pleated flounce at the top. Seam at the waist with ties at the sides, a concealed zip in one side and a pleated skirt. Lined.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit. One wide shoulder strap with a cut-out section at the front, a cut-out section at one side, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details and glittery sections. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a fold-down shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey hair elastics without metal clips.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with a zip fly and button.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Soft slippers in velour with a lenticular print. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a wide, partly ribbed rubber trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Cap in cotton twill with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back (size 6 months to 2Y with elastication).
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit viscose and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Dress in lightweight denim with a button placket, frill trim at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester. Chunky patterned soles.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an imitation suede appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Shirt in a linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Oversized top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a wide, rib-trimmed neckline. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a rounded, rib-trimmed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with embroidery, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the front and long sleeves.
Fitted, collarless jacket in a linen blend with welt front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers, and no buttons.
Small shoulder bag in soft, grained imitation leather. A flap with a metal fastener and a narrow, metal chain shoulder strap. Unlined. Size approx. 7.5x16.5x19.5 cm.

Long, straight-cut shirt in an airy linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a tab and button, and slits in the sides.
Scarf in a soft rib knit. Size 27x185 cm.
Lace tights with an elasticated waist.
Top in slub cotton jersey with an interactive appliqué on the front, short cap sleeves, narrow ribbing around the neckline and short slits at the sides.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Foldaway backpack in woven fabric with a zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps with plastic fasteners. One zipped inner compartment and a zipped outer compartment in which the backpack can be easily folded and enclosed. Practical carry strap at the top when the backpack is folded away. Size 14.5x30x46 cm. Size when folded 3x19x23 cm.
Long knitted jumper in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover polo neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shortie briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs, full coverage at the back and laser-cut edges.

Trousers in a sturdy cotton and viscose weave. High waist, an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Discreet, buttoned pockets in the side seams, a jetted back pocket with a button and straight, wide legs with creases.
Long-sleeved dress in printed sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the hips and gently flared, pleated skirt in woven fabric.
Earrings in metal and plastic. Length 9 cm.
Boxy-style hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with embroidery. Adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Sleeveless lace top with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and a scalloped hem. Jersey lining.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Jumpsuit woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, zip fly, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, wide dress in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top. Dropped shoulders, short wide sleeves and large patch front pockets.
